          <title>
            <string language="en">Movement of stars and constellations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Sterne und der Konstellationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement de tient le premier rôle et des 
constellations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento das estrelas e das constelações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento delle stelle e delle costellazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετακίνηση των αστεριών και των αστερισμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de estrellas y de constelaciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the direction of movement of Ursa major constellation in reference to the star Polaris (a) and the changes in the positions of stars as seen at different months (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polaris</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ursa major</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">constellations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">months</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die 
Bewegungsrichtung von Ursa Hauptkonstellation in der Referenz auf dem 
Stern Polarstern (a) und die Änderungen in den Positionen der Sterne,
wie gesehen an unterschiedlichen Monaten (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre la direction du mouvement 
d'Ursa constellation principale dans la référence à l'étoile 
polaire de tenir le premier rôle (a) et les changements des positions de 
tient le premier rôle comme vu aux différents mois (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra o sentido de movimento de 
Ursa constelação principal na referência ao polaris da estrela (a) 
e as mudanças nas posições das estrelas como visto nos meses 
diferentes (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra il senso di movimento di 
Ursa costellazione principale nel riferimento al polaris della stella 
(a) ed i cambiamenti nelle posizioni delle stelle come visto ai mesi 
differenti (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την κατεύθυνση της 
μετακίνησης σημαντικού αστερισμού Ursa στην αναφορά στο αστέρι
Polaris (α) και των αλλαγών στις θέσεις των αστεριών όπως 
βλέπουνε στους διαφορετικούς μήνες (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la dirección del movimiento
de Ursa constelación importante en referencia a la estrella polar de 
la estrella (a) y los cambios en las posiciones de estrellas según lo
considerado en diversos meses (b).</string>
          </description>
